europeana:record.dc:title: Macrobrachium Ahkowi nοm. nov., a replacement name for Macrobrachium Johnsoni Chong & Khoo, 1987, preoccupied by Macrobrachium Johnsoni Ravindranath, 1979 (Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Chong S.S.C.
Khoo H.W.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
replacement name; Macrobrachium ahkowi; Macrobrachium johnsoni Chong & Khoo; Macrobrachium johnsoni Ravindranath
europeana:record.dc:description: The recently described Macrobrachium johnsoni Chong & Khoo, turns out to be a junior primary homonym of M. johnsoni Ravindranath. The replacement name M. ahkowi is proposed.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Macrobrachium Ahkowi nοm. nov., a replacement name for Macrobrachium Johnsoni Chong & Khoo, 1987, preoccupied by Macrobrachium Johnsoni Ravindranath, 1979 (Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 61) (Issue 37)
